about_the_game:
You are a man who stumbled upon success through an unexpected investment.

Your days are leisurely and carefree, with little to worry about financially aside from managing your real estate properties.

One day, however, your peaceful life is disrupted by the arrival of two letters—both from your tenants.

This unusual occurrence sparks your curiosity and raises questions.

Determined to uncover what’s going on, you decide to visit their residence in person.

When you arrive and push open the door, the sight before you takes you by surprise—your two tenants are elegant, refined women, exuding a graceful demeanor.

Despite the seemingly tranquil facade, subtle hints of unease and unspoken troubles linger in their expressions, drawing you in to learn more.

The core objective of this story is simple: by conversing with these two tenants, uncover the details of their lives, delve into the challenges they face, and reveal the truths hidden beneath their composed exteriors.

Character

Kyoko is all about coffee.

She’s obsessed with crafting the perfect cup, pouring her heart and soul into every brew.

To her, coffee isn’t just a drink—it’s her sanctuary.

Saori is sweet, bubbly, and effortlessly approachable.

She’s the kind of person who’s always ready to help, sometimes to the point of being taken advantage of.

Whenever you visit, she greets you with a warm smile and an array of snacks—cookies, cakes, you name it. It’s clear she has a major sweet tooth!

Her natural charm and striking appearance often draw attention, especially her… well, let’s just say her curves don’t go unnoticed. But Saori herself seems completely oblivious to the effect she has on others.

Gameplay

This game is a visual novel where you can freely explore your apartment and the homes of your two tenants.

In this story, you’ll take on the challenge of developing relationships with your tenants, starting from mutual disdain and progressing toward subtle romance.

Through engaging in conversations with them, you’ll gradually unlock more of their stories and secrets, gaining a deeper understanding of each tenant's unique circumstances.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains mild adult-themed content, including:
Sexual harassment language and sexually suggestive dialogue.
All characters in the game are 18 years old or older.

name: Please pay the rent!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: You found success through an unexpected investment, living a carefree life managing properties. One day, two letters from tenants spark your curiosity. Visiting their residence, you meet two elegant women, their refined demeanor hiding subtle unease, drawing you in to uncover the story behind it.
